{"step_by_step_thinking": "The symptoms described, including vaginal itching, green frothy discharge, and a 'strawberry' appearance of the vagina, are indicative of Trichomoniasis, a sexually transmitted infection caused by the parasite Trichomonas vaginalis. The first-line treatment for Trichomoniasis is Metronidazole.", "answer_choice": "C. Metronidazole"}
